title: British locomotives
creator_credit: Greenpark Productions, Humphrey Swingler, G. Buckland-Smith and Clifford Hornby
brief_description: The development of the British locomotive from 1825 to the latest and most powerful diesel and electric locomotive. Shows British Railway’s modernisation plan, different categories of locomotives and rolling stock, specially produced for overseas markets, in operation in different parts of the world.
creator_credit_for_label: Greenpark Productions, Humphrey Swingler, G. Buckland-Smith and Clifford Hornby
